display_long_description:
# 👊 The Ultimate Stress-Buster!
Play HIT and take out your stress by pummelling, slapping, and whacking squishy clay heads in a VR sandbox. Thanks to our wild soft body physics, every hit deforms and reshapes the heads in hilariously unpredictable ways!  
  
[media]
  
# 🪓Choose Your Weapon  
Fists, frying pans, baseball bats—even a flopping fish!  
  
[media]
  
# 👤30 Unique Heads to Wreck  
Each one reacts to your hits with funny voices and expressions.  
  
[media]
  
# 🏝️Chill Vibes:  
Destroy in peace, surrounded by a tranquil paradise.  
  
[media]
  
# ⭐Development Roadmap  
**100** store reviews = **3 new weapons** added  
**1000** store reviews  =  **10 new clay models**  added (have your say on which!)  
**10000** store reviews =  **upload your own clay models feature** added  
  
# Join our Discord and tell us what to add next: https://discord.gg/ay3PfTKzw3

[media]
